Title: DeepZoomContainer, Expanded DeepZoom for Silverlight & Windows Phone 7 Series
Description: DeepZoom enables powerful functions to build large-scale image-based projects such as GIS application, games, and more.
HomeWiki:
http://twitter.com/fkiller

[NEW] Windows Phone 7 Series Support

Launch in another window




Project Description
DeepZoom enables powerful functions to build large-scale image-based projects such as GIS application, games, and more.

This library is a part of components of ROH Project: The Automata Storytelling Engine and Its Prototype.

Sample Page : http://hirihiri.com/project_ROH/silverlight/deepzoomcontainer/DeepZoomContainer.TestTestPage.html
(Image by Guild Wars @ Gameamp, Car by MSDN)

Project/Directory Description

/DeepZoomContainer
Main class package project that has several useful classes, such as PushPin, WheelMouseListener, and DeepZoom Container.

/DeepZoomContainer.Test
Silverlight application that test DeepZoomContainer class.

/DeepZoomContainer.Test.Web
Web application that contains DeepZoomContainer.Test silverlight application.

/PathAnimation
Silverlight Path Animation Class(dll only)

/Document
XML Documentation of classes
